issue.title: [Rust]: Builder benchmarks are giving segfault
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10339](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10339). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On the rustc stable(rustc 1.47.0 (18bf6b4f0 2020-10-07)) boolean benchmarks are giving segfault for the arrow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10339?focusedCommentId=17332139) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/114
